00039 QVariant LibraryTreeModel::headerData(int section, Qt::Orientation orientation,
00040                 int role) const {
00041 
00042         // only one column in tree view
00043         if (section != 0) {
00044                 return QVariant();
00045         }
00046         // only horizontal headers
00047         else if (orientation != Qt::Horizontal) {
00048                 return QVariant();
00049         }
00050         // for displayRole
00051         else if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00052                 return tr("Library components");
00053         }
00054         // not supported role
00055         else {
00056                 return QVariant();
00057         }
00058 }

00060 int LibraryTreeModel::columnCount(const QModelIndex&) const {

00063 
00064 int LibraryTreeModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex &parent) const {
00065 
00066         // only one column exists
00067         if (parent.column() > 0) {
00068                 return 0;
00069         }
00070 
00071         LibraryItem *parentItem = 0;
00072 
00073         // if the given item is invalid, it is interpreted as root item
00074         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00075                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00076         }
00077         else {
00078                 parentItem = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00079         }
00080 
00081         // return how many children the parent has
00082         return parentItem->getNumberOfChildren();
00083 }
00084 
00085 QModelIndex LibraryTreeModel::index(int row, int column,
00086                 const QModelIndex &parent) const {
00087 
00088         if (!hasIndex(row, column, parent)) {
00089                 return QModelIndex();
00090         }
00091 
00092         LibraryItem* parentItem = 0;
00093 
00094         // if the index of the parent is invalid then it is the root item
00095         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00096                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00097         }
00098         else {
00099                 parentItem = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00100         }
00101 
00102         if (!parentItem) {
00103                 return QModelIndex();
00104         }
00105 
00106         // find the child item of the parent
00107         LibraryItem *child = parentItem->child(row);
00108 
00109         // if the child is found
00110         if (child) {
00111                 return createIndex(row, column, child);
00112         }
00113         else {
00114                 return QModelIndex();
00115         }
00116 }
00117 
00118 QModelIndex LibraryTreeModel::index(LibraryItem* item ) {
00119 
00120         // if pointer is null
00121         if (!item)
00122                 return QModelIndex();
00123 
00124         // if this item has no parent then it is the root item
00125         LibraryItem* parent = item->parent();
00126         if (!parent)
00127                 return QModelIndex();
00128 
00129         // create the index for the child
00130         return createIndex(item->row(), 0, item);
00131 }
00132 
00133 QModelIndex LibraryTreeModel::parent(const QModelIndex &child) const {
00134 
00135         // if invalid index
00136         if(!child.isValid()) {
00137                 return QModelIndex();
00138         }
00139 
00140         // pointer to the child item
00141         LibraryItem *childItem = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(child.internalPointer());
00142         LibraryItem *parent = childItem->parent();
00143 
00144         // if the parent does not exist then this item is root item
00145         if (!parent) {
00146                 return QModelIndex();
00147         }
00148 
00149         // if row is invalid then the grandparent does not exist and parent is
00150         // a root item so we return an invalid QModelIndex
00151         int row = parent->row();
00152         if (row == -1) {
00153                 return QModelIndex();
00154         }
00155 
00156         // create new index and return it
00157         return createIndex(row, 0, parent);
00158 }

00160 QVariant LibraryTreeModel::data(const QModelIndex& index, int role) const {
00161 
00162         if (!index.isValid()) {
00163                 return QVariant();
00164         }
00165 
00166         LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00167 
00168         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00169 
00170                 return item->getName();
00171         }
00172 
00173         else if (role == Qt::ForegroundRole) {
00174                 QColor textColor;
00175 
00176                 // if the item is valid it is displayed as black
00177                 if (item->isValid()) {
00178                         textColor = QColor("black");
00179                 }
00180 
00181                 // if the document is not valid then it is marked with red color
00182                 else {
00183                         textColor = QColor("red");
00184                 }
00185 
00186                 return QBrush(textColor);
00187         }
00188 
00189         else if (role == Qt::ToolTipRole) {
00190                 
00191                 VLNV* vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00192                 
00193                 // if item can identify a single library object
00194                 if (vlnv) {
00195                         QString tip = tr("Vendor: %1\n").arg(vlnv->getVendor());
00196                         tip += tr("Library: %1\n").arg(vlnv->getLibrary());
00197                         tip += tr("Name: %1\n").arg(vlnv->getName());
00198                         tip += tr("Version: %1\n").arg(vlnv->getVersion());
00199                         tip += tr("File path: %1").arg(dataSource_->getPath(*vlnv));
00200                         return tip;
00201                 }
00202 
00203                 // if item did not represent a single vlnv item
00204                 return QVariant();
00205         }
00206         else if (role == Qt::DecorationRole) {
00207                 
00208                 VLNV* vlnvP = item->getVLNV();
00209                 
00210                 // if item represents a single vlnv object
00211                 if (vlnvP) {
00212 
00213                         if (vlnvP->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00214 
00215                                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(*vlnvP);
00216                                 QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00217 
00218                                 switch (component->getComponentImplementation()) {
00219                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS: {
00220                                         return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-system.png");
00221                                                                                            }
00222                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW: {
00223                                         KactusAttribute::SWType swType = component->getComponentSWType();
00224 
00225                                         if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION)
00226                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-sw_component.png");
00227                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM) 
00228                                                 return QIcon(":icons/graphics/API.png");
00229                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS)
00230                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/endpoints.png");
00231                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING) 
00232                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-sw_design.png");
00233                                                                                           }
00234                                 default: {
00235                                         if (component->isHierarchical()) {
00236                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/hierarchy.png");
00237                                         }
00238                                         else
00239                                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/component.png");
00240                                                  }
00241                                 }
00242                         }
00243 
00244                         // if item is for a bus
00245                         else if (vlnvP->getType() == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION ||
00246                                 vlnvP->getType() == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
00247                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-bus.png");
00248                         }
00249 
00250                         // if item is for a design
00251                         else if (vlnvP->getType() == VLNV::DESIGN) {
00252                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/new-design.png");
00253                         }
00254 
00255                         // if item is for a design configuration
00256                         else if (vlnvP->getType() == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00257                                 return QIcon(":/icons/graphics/configuration.png");
00258                         }
00259                         // item has no icon
00260                         else
00261                                 return QVariant();
00262                 }
00263                 // if item does not represent a single vlnv then no icon
00264                 else 
00265                         return QVariant();      
00266         }
00267         
00268         // unsupported data role
00269         else {
00270                 return QVariant();
00271         }
00272 }

00274 Qt::ItemFlags LibraryTreeModel::flags(const QModelIndex& index) const {
00275 
00276         // if given index is invalid
00277         if (!index.isValid()) {
00278                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled;
00279         }
00280 
00281         return (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
00282 }

00284 bool LibraryTreeModel::hasChildren(const QModelIndex& parent) const {
00285 
00286         // only one column exists
00287         if (parent.column() > 0) {
00288                 return false;
00289         }
00290 
00291         LibraryItem *parentItem = 0;
00292 
00293         // if the given item is invalid, it is interpreted as root item
00294         if (!parent.isValid()) {
00295                 parentItem = rootItem_.data();
00296         }
00297         else {
00298                 parentItem = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(parent.internalPointer());
00299         }
00300 
00301         // return how many children the parent has
00302         return parentItem->hasChildren();
00303 }

00305 void LibraryTreeModel::onExportItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00306         if (!index.isValid())
00307                 return;
00308 
00309         // get pointer to the item that was selected
00310         LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00311 
00312         // ask the item for all the VLNVs it represents
00313         QList<VLNV*> vlnvList;
00314         item->getVLNVs(vlnvList);
00315 
00316         emit exportItems(vlnvList);
00317 }
00318 
00319 void LibraryTreeModel::onDeleteItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00320         if (!index.isValid())
00321                 return;
00322 
00323         LibraryItem* child = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00324 
00325         LibraryItem* toRemove = child->findHighestUnique();
00326 
00327         // ask the item for all the VLNVs it represents
00328         QList<VLNV*> vlnvList;
00329         toRemove->getVLNVs(vlnvList);
00330 
00331         // inform the library handler that these VLNVs should be removed
00332         emit removeVLNV(vlnvList);
00333 }
00334 
00335 void LibraryTreeModel::onRemoveVLNV(VLNV* vlnv ) {
00336 
00337         if (!vlnv)
00338                 return;
00339 
00340         LibraryItem* toRemove = rootItem_->findHighestUnique(vlnv);
00341         
00342         // remove the item and it's sub-items but no need to inform dataModel 
00343         // because the removal action was started by the dataModel
00344         if (toRemove)
00345                 removeLibraryItem(toRemove, false);
00346 
00347 }
00348 
00349 void LibraryTreeModel::removeLibraryItem( LibraryItem* toRemove, bool emitSignals) {
00350         
00351         int row = toRemove->parent()->getIndexOf(toRemove);
00352 
00353         // ask the item for all the VLNVs it represents
00354         QList<VLNV*> vlnvList;
00355         toRemove->getVLNVs(vlnvList);
00356 
00357         QModelIndex removeIndex = createIndex(row, 0, toRemove);
00358 
00359         // get the model index of the parent
00360         QModelIndex parentIndex = parent(removeIndex);
00361 
00362         beginRemoveRows(parentIndex, row, row);
00363         toRemove->parent()->removeChild(toRemove);
00364         endRemoveRows();
00365 
00366         // if signals were to be emitted
00367         if (emitSignals) {
00368                 // inform the dataModel that these VLNVs should be removed
00369                 emit removeVLNV(vlnvList);
00370         }
00371 
00372         emit refreshDialer();
00373 }
00374 
00375 void LibraryTreeModel::onResetModel() {
00376         
00377         beginResetModel();
00378 
00379         // if root item does not yet exist
00380         if (!rootItem_) {
00381                 // create the root item
00382                 rootItem_ = QSharedPointer<LibraryItem>(new LibraryItem(tr("root"), this));
00383         }
00384         // if root item exists then tell it to clear it's children
00385         else {
00386                 rootItem_->clear();
00387         }
00388 
00389         // get the items to be displayed from the data source
00390         QList<VLNV*> items =
00391                 dataSource_->getItems();
00392 
00393         // add all items to this model
00394         for (int i = 0; i < items.size(); ++i) {
00395                 rootItem_->createChild(items.value(i),
00396                         static_cast<LibraryItem::Level>(0));
00397         }
00398 
00399         endResetModel();
00400 
00401         emit refreshDialer();
00402 }
00403 
00404 LibraryItem* LibraryTreeModel::getRoot() const {
00405         return rootItem_.data();
00406 }

00408 void LibraryTreeModel::onOpenBus( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00409 
00410         if (!index.isValid())
00411                 return;
00412 
00413         LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00414 
00415         VLNV* vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00416 
00417         if (vlnv && vlnv->isValid())
00418                 emit editItem(*vlnv);
00419 }
00420 
00421 void LibraryTreeModel::onCreateBus( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00422 
00423         if (!index.isValid())
00424                 return;
00425 
00426         LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00427 
00428         VLNV vlnv;
00429         vlnv.setType(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION);
00430         item->setVlnv(vlnv);
00431 
00432         emit createBus(vlnv);
00433 }
